name: Trident Alliance
memberOrga:
Please see our website for our latest membership lists: 
http://www.tridentalliance.org/members/
goal: The Trident Alliance is a coalition of ship owners and operators in favour of effective enforcement of martime sulphur regulation.  It seeks to co-operate with other stakeholders to realise this objective. Robust enforcement is essential for avoiding competition distortion  among ship operators and owners, considering the large financial gains of gross violation, as well as to protect health and environmental interests.
interests: Competition, Environment, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Single market, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Implementation of the Sulphur Directive (2012/33/EU) in particular enforcement of the sulphur limits for maritime fuels.
